translations.transtext: 29. I will receive almsfood with bean curry in proper proportion: a training to be observed.
๒๙. พึงทำศึกษาว่า “เราจักรับบิณฑบาตมีสูปะเสมอกัน”
29. I shall accept alms-food with other foods in proportion (that is, in the proportion of one part in four to the rice): this is a training to be done.
